Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu - can you add some more detail here and is this alpha2 or beta?

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 this issue was fixed with this patch https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/10351/... We didn't observe any failures after this patch. Will monitor fabric-sdk-node-verify-x86_64 builds.
